title: CANT BUY RP
body: Hi, I've been trying to purchase $5 worth of RP for me and my friend but it isnt working :/ pls help

replies.body: What error or issues are you seeing when this happens. A few more details can help me figure out what's going on.
when i went to buy RP with my VISA, a pop-up said "pls wait 24 hours".  it's ok now, i used a subway gift card. thx anyway :)
Did you bought a prepaid card?
no, i tried using a VISA
